docs.snippet: Pittsburgh Steelers linebacker James Harrison and two Green Bay Packers defensive players met with N.F.L. investigators looking into allegations linking them to performance-enhancing drugs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers linebacker James Harrison and two Green Bay Packers defensive players met with N.F.L. investigators looking into allegations linking them to performance-enhancing drugs.

docs.snippet: An investor group whose members manage 850 billion pounds ($1.1 trillion) of UK equities has taken the unusual step of publicly rebuking the management of Sports Direct and calling for an independent review....
docs.lead_paragraph: An investor group whose members manage 850 billion pounds ($1.1 trillion) of UK equities has taken the unusual step of publicly rebuking the management of Sports Direct and calling for an independent review.

headline.main: Investor Group Rebukes Sports Direct, Wants Review of Management
headline.print_headline: Investor Group Rebukes Sports Direct, Wants Review of Management

docs.snippet: An explosion at a sports center in the southern Belgian town of Chimay early on Friday killed one person and wounded four others, two of them seriously, Belgium's Crisis Center said....
docs.lead_paragraph: An explosion at a sports center in the southern Belgian town of Chimay early on Friday killed one person and wounded four others, two of them seriously, Belgium's Crisis Center said.

headline.main: Blast at Belgian Sports Center Kills One, Gas Accident Suspected
headline.print_headline: Blast at Belgian Sports Center Kills One, Gas Accident Suspected

docs.snippet: Kuwait has dissolved its Olympic committee and the country's national soccer association, further deepening an ongoing dispute over the direction of sports in the oil-rich country....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kuwait has dissolved its Olympic committee and the country's national soccer association, further deepening an ongoing dispute over the direction of sports in the oil-rich country.

headline.main: Kuwait Dissolves Olympic Committee, Soccer Association

docs.snippet: China's richest man, Wang Jianlin, has signed an agreement to invest 63 billion yuan ($9.45 billion) to build a tourism and sports complex in Jinan city, cinema-to-theme park developer Dalian Wanda Group said in a statement on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: China's richest man, Wang Jianlin, has signed an agreement to invest 63 billion yuan ($9.45 billion) to build a tourism and sports complex in Jinan city, cinema-to-theme park developer Dalian Wanda Group said in a statement on Friday.

headline.main: Wanda to Invest $9.5 Billion in China Tourism Park
headline.print_headline: Wanda to Invest $9.5 Billion in China Tourism Park

docs.snippet: Russia will appeal in the Swiss Federal Court on Monday against the Court of Arbitration for Sport's (CAS) decision to uphold a blanket ban on their athletes from competing in next month's Rio Paralympics....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia will appeal in the Swiss Federal Court on Monday against the Court of Arbitration for Sport's (CAS) decision to uphold a blanket ban on their athletes from competing in next month's Rio Paralympics.

headline.main: Russia to Appeal Against Rio Ban in Court
headline.print_headline: Russia to Appeal Against Rio Ban in Court

docs.snippet: The annual Rieti athletics meeting has been canceled to let local officials dedicate their resources toward recovery from the earthquake that killed at least 267 people in the area....
docs.lead_paragraph: The annual Rieti athletics meeting has been canceled to let local officials dedicate their resources toward recovery from the earthquake that killed at least 267 people in the area.

headline.main: Rieti Athletics Meeting Canceled Due to Earthquake Aftermath
headline.print_headline: Rieti Athletics Meeting Canceled Due to Earthquake Aftermath

docs.snippet: Two members of Guinea's Olympic team disappeared from the athletes village in Rio and have not been seen since, possibly having become illegal economic migrants, a senior sports official told Reuters on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two members of Guinea's Olympic team disappeared from the athletes village in Rio and have not been seen since, possibly having become illegal economic migrants, a senior sports official told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: Two Guinea Athletes Flee Olympic Village, Stay in Brazil
headline.print_headline: Two Guinea Athletes Flee Olympic Village, Stay in Brazil
